item.title: About
item.description: I am currently the Vice President of Engineering at GrayQuest Finance and possess over 5+ years of expertise as a Full Stack Developer. My forte primarily lies in building large scale automated systems. A penchant for technology is the result of my passion to solve problems by leveraging the same. I am particularly interested in automation and open source projects. In my leisure time, I read and absorb the latest updates about everything tech.
